# bal-modal

A Modal is a dialog that appears on top of the app's body, and must be dismissed by
the app before interaction can resume.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                     | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `card`   | `card`    | Marks this modal as card-style modal, i.e. having visual lines separating head, body, and foot. | `boolean` | `false` |


## Methods

### `close() => Promise<void>`

Closes the modal.

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`



### `open() => Promise<void>`

Opens the modal.

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`
